sqldiff.help:
USE: The diffs are ordered by data model version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not fail or overwrite old data
EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Stanslaus Odhiambo
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS kenyaemrIL_inbox (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` TINYINT(1) NULL,`message_type` VARCHAR(38) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS kenyaemrIL_outbox (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` TINYINT(1) NULL, `message_type` VARCHAR(38) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
